text: Shin-Yokohama Station (新横浜駅,しんよこはまえき) is a railway station of JR Central, JR East, and Yokohama Municipal Subway in Yokohama, Japan. ==Adjacent stations== ;JR Central :Tōkaidō Shinkansen ::Shinagawa - Shin-Yokohama - Odawara ;JR East :Yokohama Line : Rapid ::Kikuna - Shin-Yokohama - Kozukue :Local ::Kikuna - Shin-Yokohama - Kamoi ;Yokohama Municipal Subway :Blue Line ::Kishine- koen(B25) - Shin-Yokohama(B26) - Kita-Shin-Yokohama(B27) ==Other websites== Category:Railway stations in Kanagawa Prefecture Category:Yokohama
title: Shin-Yokohama Station
